component.name: getBuckets
component.description: Return the request payment configuration of a bucket.

component.name: deleteBucket
component.description: Deletes the bucket named in the URI. All objects (including all object versions and Delete Markers) in the bucket must be deleted before the bucket itself can be deleted

component.name: deleteBucketCors
component.description: Deletes the cors configuration information set for the bucket

component.name: deleteBucketLifecycle
component.description: Deletes the lifecycle configuration from the specified bucket

component.name: deleteBucketReplication
component.description: Deletes the replication subresource associated with the specified bucket

component.name: deleteBucketTagging
component.description: Removes a tag set from the specified bucket

component.name: createBucket
component.description: Get details about payments that have not completed

component.name: createBucketCors
component.description: Sets the cors configuration for your bucket

component.name: createBucketACL
component.description: Set the permissions on an existing bucket using access control lists

component.name: createBucketLifecycle
component.description: Creates a new lifecycle configuration for the bucket or replaces an existing lifecycle configuration

component.name: createBucketReplication
component.description: Creates a new replication configuration

component.name: createBucketTagging
component.description: Adds a set of tags to an existing bucket

component.name: createBucketRequestPayment
component.description: Set the request payment configuration of a bucket

component.name: createBucketVersioning
component.description: Set the versioning state of an existing bucket

component.name: getBucketVersioning
component.description: Returns the versioning state of a bucket

component.name: checkBucketPermission
component.description: Determine if a bucket exists and you have permission to access it

component.name: getBucketACL
component.description: Return the access control list (ACL) of a bucket

component.name: deleteBucketPolicy
component.description: Delete the policy on a specified bucket

component.name: deleteBucketWebsiteConfiguration
component.description: Removes the website configuration for a bucket

component.name: createBucketWebsiteConfiguration
component.description: Sets the configuration of the website that is specified in the website subresource

component.name: getWebSiteConfiguration
component.description: Returns the website configuration associated with a bucket

component.name: getObjectsInBucket
component.description: Rreturns some or all (up to 1000) of the objects in a bucket

component.name: getBucketObjectVersions
component.description: List metadata about all of the versions of objects in a bucket

component.name: getBucketLifeCycle
component.description: Returns the lifecycle configuration information set on the bucket

component.name: getBucketPolicy
component.description: Return the policy of a specified bucket

component.name: getBucketLocation
component.description: Returns a bucket's region

component.name: getBucketLogging
component.description: Returns the logging status of a bucket

component.name: getBucketNotification
component.description: Returns the notification configuration of a bucket

component.name: getBucketCors
component.description: Returns the cors configuration information set for the bucket

component.name: getBucketReplication
component.description: Returns replication configuration information set on the bucket

component.name: getBucketTagging
component.description: Returns the tag set associated with the bucket

component.name: createBucketPolicy
component.description: Add to or replace a policy on a bucket

component.name: getBucketRequestPayment
component.description: Return the request payment configuration of a bucket

component.name: setBucketACL
component.description: Set the permissions on an existing bucket using access control lists(ACL)

component.name: headBucket
component.description: To determine if a bucket exists and you have permission to access it

component.name: listMultipartUploads
component.description: Lists in-progress multipart uploads
